name: Calgary International Airport - Inside the ATC Tower ᴴᴰ
description:
Today, I was given the opportunity to have a tour of Calgary International Airport's Air Traffic Control Tower by a very generous controller. This is just a short bit of what was an educational and exciting 50 minute tour of Nav Canada's facility. Enjoy!

Thanks for watching!
